parameter.name: import_format
parameter.documentation: Specify the format of the imported file

parameter.name: import_overlay
parameter.documentation: if on, the import object will always be displayed last

parameter.name: import_x_position
parameter.documentation: X position of the imported image

parameter.name: import_y_position
parameter.documentation: Y position of the imported image

parameter.name: import_width
parameter.documentation: Width of the imported image (-1 means use the dimension of the image)

parameter.name: import_height
parameter.documentation: Height of the imported image (-1 means use the dimension of the image)
